name: Cultural Holiday to the land of Hidden paradise
description:
Get transported to a land like no other with Sikkim, known for its clear mountain air, pristine landscapes and quaint monasteries. Once you step in here, you will be entranced with a lake nestled amongst snow-capped mountains, monastery consecrated by Dalai Lama, a sacred lake where all your wishes come true and a lot more. Our tour will unravel this ‘hidden kingdom’.

The experiences offered are innumerable. Spot Siberian tigers and red pandas at the Padmaja Naidu Himalayan Zoological Park, catch the sunrise over the Kanchenjunga Peak that is the third highest mountain in the world, get a sense of the ingenious crafts and arts with the Directorate of Handicraft & Handloom tour and head to the Rumtek Monastery where the Golden Stupa contains the sacred relics of His Holiness, the Sixteenth Karmapa.
